name: Databricks
notes: Lakehouse platform with strong enterprise renewals; competitive with Snowflake. Key risks: cloud cost sensitivity, platform migration friction.

name: Stripe
notes: Global payments and issuing stack; expanding into treasury and lending. Risks: margin pressure from competition and regulatory shifts.

name: Anthropic
notes: Claude model adoption growing in enterprise; unit costs tied to frontier model training and inference. Needs capitalization discipline.
